definition: awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)
awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)

sentences.english: Speaking of Fortune kiln, not only hemp cities, mountains are famous throughout the eastern Hubei.
sentences.chinese: 說起富鑫窯，不單麻城市，整個鄂東山區都赫赫有名。

sentences.english: Who has the right to be within the system of power and righteousness?
sentences.chinese: 誰有特權處在威勢赫赫的體制內部？

sentences.english: He is a very experienced general and has made great contributions in battles.
sentences.chinese: 他是名久經沙場的大將軍，戰功赫赫。

sentences.english: They had audited financials, big-name lawyers and Bank of America.
sentences.chinese: 而且他們有財務審計師，名聲赫赫的律師和美國銀行。

sentences.english: He was the deadest shot in the county one time .
sentences.chinese: 他過去是全縣赫赫有名的神槍手。

sentences.english: This famous unit had rendered the highest service.
sentences.chinese: 這支赫赫有名的部隊曾立過很大的戰功。

sentences.english: Tanggula Mountains to the south of the Brahmaputra is famous.
sentences.chinese: 唐古拉山以南，就是赫赫有名的雅魯藏布江。

sentences.english: Orchids are also well known and very famous for the wide range of species out there.
sentences.chinese: 蘭花也以因其品種繁多而赫赫有名。

sentences.english: Little says. “They had audited financials, big-name lawyers and Bank of America.
sentences.chinese: 而且他們有財務審計師，名聲赫赫的律師和美國銀行。

sentences.english: Little says. "They had audited financials, big-name lawyers and Bank of America."
sentences.chinese: 而且他們有財務審計師，名聲赫赫的律師和美國銀行。

sentences.english: The old man has had a distinguished career in the diplomatic service.
sentences.chinese: 這位老人從事名聲赫赫的在外交職業。

sentences.english: Become the Qing far-famed " businessman with red top " late.
sentences.chinese: 成爲晚清赫赫有名的“紅頂商人”。

definition: to inspire awe throughout the empire (idiom)
to triumph in every battle (idiom); invincible/to succeed in every undertaking
to consider oneself unexcelled in the world/to be insufferably arrogant
